divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were on i-65 n, after going to see a movie, we were headed home from rivergate. we were on two mile pkwy (rivergate pkwy)entry ramp to the interstate and after we topped the hill that is where we observed a rectangular shaped object hovering almost directly above the tyson plant. i can only assume it was rectangular in shape from the lights. the lights on 2 corners were white and blue\green flashing in color. the lights on the other 2 corners were a purplish\orange white. it was huge. my husband observed it, however he was driving. we drove past it and it sat there. didn't move an inch. i turned in my seat and still watched it sit there, until we past millersville exit ramp and topped the hill on the other side. i could not believe what i saw... it had to have been the length of a commercial jet and i know that other people had to have seen it as well. the lighting on the ground below it and from the cars on 65-s made it impossible to make out any more details. i just wish that we could have stopped and observed it better but we had to get home to my brother who was on the phone with me at the time. i had cellphone interference as well.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Goodlettsville
There were no other sightings in Goodlettsville on or around December 14th 1971
